service.name: Spicy vs Sweet
service.description: Spicy vs Sweet is a web-based SaaS platform that helps sales professionals, marketers, and business developers improve their cold email outreach campaigns. Using Google's advanced Gemini AI, Spicy vs Sweet analyzes emails in real-time and provides detailed feedback across 7 critical dimensions.

core_capabilities.name: Subject Line Analysis
core_capabilities.description: Evaluates subject line effectiveness, length, curiosity factor, and spam trigger words

core_capabilities.name: Personalization Assessment
core_capabilities.description: Analyzes depth of personalization, research quality, and relevance to recipient

core_capabilities.name: Value Proposition Clarity
core_capabilities.description: Measures clarity, specificity, and persuasiveness of the value offered

core_capabilities.name: Call-to-Action Strength
core_capabilities.description: Evaluates CTA clarity, action orientation, and ease of next steps

core_capabilities.name: Length Optimization
core_capabilities.description: Assesses email brevity and readability for maximum engagement

core_capabilities.name: Tone and Language
core_capabilities.description: Analyzes professionalism, formality, and language appropriateness

core_capabilities.name: Overall Professionalism
core_capabilities.description: Evaluates grammar, spelling, formatting, and overall presentation

core_capabilities.name: Sentence-Level Rewrites
core_capabilities.description: Provides before/after examples of specific improvements

core_capabilities.name: Prioritized Suggestions
core_capabilities.description: Lists actionable improvements ordered by impact

benefits: Save time on email editing and review
Learn best practices through AI feedback
Avoid spam filters and common mistakes
